title: Morning Joe 2/23/21
description: President Joe Biden marked the milestone of 500,000 lives lost to the coronavirus in an address to the nation Monday evening. The Morning Joe panel discusses the importance of Biden's message.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
